titleStmt.title: The first sermon preached to King Charles, at Saint Iames 3⁰. April. 1625. By Iohn Donne, Deane of Saint Pauls, London.
titleStmt.author: Donne, John, 1572-1631.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by A[ugustine]. M[athewes]. for Thomas Iones, and are to bee sold at his shop at the signe of the Blacke Rauen in the Strand,

notesStmt.note: With two lines of errata on H4r. Variant: with one line of errata.
Also issued as part of "Foure sermons upon speciall occasions" and of "Five sermons upon speciall occasions".
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Blacke Rauen in the Strand
